### Homework

All homework assignments are covered by the course [policy on collaboration](policy_on_collaboration.html). 

In addition to grading for content, we reserve the right to deduct points for stylistic elements (e.g. proper spacing and indentation; relevant variable names; clear text; etc). Having code that runs and answers homework questions doesn't mean you have **good** code and text! The course [style rubric](homework_style_rubric.html) details point deductions for style.
